channel.title: Requesting Bitmap Pick of Bone
channel.description:
Well im starting my bone burryer and i was planning to use Bitmaps when i relize for some reason my print screen key wont work so i cnat get a pic for the bitmap to load :(
I just need a pick of a Bone in ur inventory thats it thnx

item.title: Requesting Bitmap Pick of Bone
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

yeah i’d say just make it find a color and the bone uptext. do you still want a BitMap cause ill get you one if you do?

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Bitmap Pick of Bone
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

why a bitmap? just thinking about it it will look pretty big, and not all bones are exactly the same. try making bitmap masks of different types of bones, or pick a color and make it find that color and the bone uptext in the inventory. just an idea…

Read full topic
